QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_1_1:
- The Head / Manager / Leadership team approves for staff.
- For Director and Head of Department, leave shall be approved by the Deputy General Director.
- For the Deputy General Director, leave shall be approved by the General Director / Chair of Board of Directors.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_2_1:
- The number of leave days is less than 02 days: the notice time before leave is at least 02 days.
- The number of leave days from 02 days to less than 04 days: the notice time before leave is at least 01 week.
- The number of leave days from 04 days or more: at least 02 weeks before leave.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_3_1:
- Employees can only take annual leave when they have passed the probationary period.
- Employees are allowed to take leave only according to the annual leave based on the actual number of working months at the Company. However, in some cases, the Employee may apply the annual leave in advance but not more than 03 days and the total taken leave has not exceeded his/her total annual leave in regulations.
- For example:
     • If you are on probation, your leave will be unpaid.
     • If the probationary period is 02 months, at the 3rd month, the employee will have 03 annual leave days.
     • If the total number of working months in a year is 03 months, in some cases, the employee can apply for the 03-day advance permit -> The total valid annual leave is 06 days. If working until the 4th month, if the employee quit his/her job, the number of days he / she has paid before will be deducted.
- If there is an unexpected need for a leave, it must notify the Head / Manager / Leadership team at least 01 hour in advance. After that, it is required to register additional day offs within 03 days from that day off.
- By the end of the fiscal year, annual leave that employees have not taken full yet shall be reserved until the end of the first quarter of the subsequent year. From the first day of the second quarter of the next year, the number of remaining days of the previous year (if any) of the employees will automatically expire.
- Fingerprint attendance should be taken seriously because it will directly affect the monthly attendance data of each employee.
QUY_DINH.LUU_Y: Note: The registration of leave is only done during the attendance period, when the time is closed, no registration is allowed.

QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_1: 1. The overtime calculation is only performed for overtime work according to the request of the Head / Manager / Leadership team and certified by the Head / Manager / Leadership team; does not charge overtime for overtime work to complete daily or work duties as planned, assigned projects, or for employees of work nature who regularly work overtime be assigned to the salary, or to the level of the Head of the department or higher.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_2: 2. The Head / Manager / Leadership team is responsible for sending "Overtime Plan" / "Overtime Proposal Form" which is approved by the Board of Directors for Human Resources Department to verify the valid of overtime registration.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_3: 3. Employees must perform fingerprint attendance when working overtime, except for overtime work outside the School/Company. This case must be verified by the Manager / Manager / Leadership team.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_4: 4. Head / Manager / Leadership team has the final responsibility in verifying the accuracy and compliance with the work requirements of the overtime working days / hours of employees under their management.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_5: 5. The registration for overtime work is only done during the attendance period, when the time is closed, no registration is allowed.

QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_1: 1. The registration for business trip is only done when it is required to handle the work for the Company (Not applicable for personal paperwork) and must be approved by the Head / Manager / Leadership team.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_2: 2. Competence to approve for business trip registration: Board of Directors / Head / Manager / Leadership team of the unit under his/her management.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_3: 3. The registration for business trip is only done during the attendance period, when the time is closed, no registration is allowed.

QUAN_LY_BO_SUNG_CONG.TAT_CA_DON_CHUA_DUYET: All leave forms have not been approved

QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_1: 1. The additional workday is only performed in case of not being able to press the fingerprint due to a system error or forget to press the fingerprint.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_2: 2. Competency to approve for additional workdays: Board of Directors / Head / Manager / Leadership team of their management units.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_3: 3. If you forget to press the fingerprint 4 or more times per month, you will be reminded and reviewed during the KPIs evaluation process.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_4: 4. Days without fingerprinting but not confirmed by the Head / Manager / Leadership team will be considered unpaid leave on that days.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_5: 5. If you arrive late from 2 to 4 hours without a valid reason, it will be considered a half-day of unpaid leave.
QUY_DINH.QUY_DINH_6: 6. Public supplementation is only performed during the attendance period, when the time is closed, no registration is allowed.
